attributes.action: Non fault claims on car insurance shouldnt effect you’re renewal premiums.
attributes.additional_details: It’s an unfair process for people involved and insurance companies are benefiting only.
attributes.background: If some one is liable and admits liability it shouldn’t effect your own car insurance only the person at fault

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban insurance companies increasing premiums after no fault claims 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734784
